name: Sunny Land (blueriverwood)
description:
My first completed Unity project! Based on a 2D Platformer Tutorial Series by Alvin Roe on YouTube, with added menu, level selection, scorekeeping, a short story, and music.

- Simple 2D Platformer with 6 Levels.

- In-game Collectables and Enemies.

Credits:

  • Based on the tutorials of Alvin Roe (YouTube)
  • Malong Le - Design, Coding, Mechanics, Music (via MuseScore)

Assets Used:

  • "Sunny Land" by Ansimuz
  • "Footstep (Snow and Grass)" by MgwSoundDesign
  • "Sound FX - Retro Pack" by Zero Rare (Levi Moore)
